Metadata.title: JSONKit - All-in-one JSON Utility
Metadata.description: Free online JSON beautifier, validator, viewer, diff, and converter.
Metadata.metaTitle: JSONKit - Free Online JSON Tools | Beautify, Validate, Compare & Convert
Metadata.metaDescription: All-in-one JSON toolkit: beautify, minify, validate, tree view, diff compare, convert to YAML/XML/CSV, JSONPath query, escape, repair, and schema validate. Free, fast, and private - all processing in your browser.

Landing.heroSubtitle: Beautify, validate, visualize, compare, and convert JSON data directly in your browser. Fast, secure, and free.

features.beautifyDesc: Format your JSON to be readable or compact it to save space.
features.validateDesc: Check your JSON for syntax errors with precise error reporting.
features.viewerDesc: Explore complex JSON structures with an interactive tree view.
features.compareDesc: Compare two JSON files side-by-side to find differences.
features.convertDesc: Convert JSON to YAML, XML, CSV and vice versa.
features.queryDesc: Extract data from JSON using powerful JSONPath expressions.
features.escapeDesc: Escape JSON strings for embedding or unescape them back.
features.repairDesc: Automatically fix malformed JSON with common issues.
features.schemaDesc: Validate JSON data against a JSON Schema definition.

featuresSection.title: Features
featuresSection.subtitle: Everything you need to handle JSON files efficiently.

valueProps.cleanInterfaceDesc: No distractions. Just the tools you need in a modern, clean UI.
valueProps.fastReactiveDesc: Instant results as you type. No waiting for server roundtrips.
valueProps.privacyFirstDesc: All processing happens in your browser. Your data never leaves your device.

Beautify.title: JSON Beautifier & Minifier
Beautify.description: Format and pretty-print your JSON data to make it easier to read, or minify it to reduce file size without changing the data.
Beautify.metaTitle: JSON Beautifier & Minifier Online - Format JSON | JSONKit
Beautify.metaDescription: Free online JSON beautifier and minifier. Pretty-print JSON with proper indentation or compress it to save space. Fast, client-side processing with no data upload.

Validate.title: JSON Validator
Validate.description: Validate your JSON strings against the standard. Find syntax errors quickly with precise line numbers and error messages.
Validate.metaTitle: JSON Validator Online - Syntax Checker with Line Numbers | JSONKit
Validate.metaDescription: Free online JSON validator and syntax checker. Detect errors with precise line numbers and detailed error messages. Validate JSON instantly in your browser.

Viewer.title: JSON Tree Viewer
Viewer.description: Visualize your JSON data as an interactive tree. Expand, collapse, and explore complex nested structures effortlessly.
Viewer.metaTitle: JSON Tree Viewer Online - Interactive JSON Explorer | JSONKit
Viewer.metaDescription: Free online JSON tree viewer. Visualize JSON as an interactive, collapsible tree structure. Explore nested objects and arrays with JSONPath copy support.
Viewer.enterValid: Enter valid JSON to view tree

Compare.title: JSON Diff & Compare
Compare.description: Compare two JSON objects side-by-side to see differences. Visual highlighting makes it easy to spot added, removed, or modified values.
Compare.metaTitle: JSON Diff & Compare Tool - Side-by-Side Comparison | JSONKit
Compare.metaDescription: Free online JSON diff and compare tool. Compare two JSON objects side-by-side with visual highlighting of added, removed, and modified values.
Compare.instruction: Edit directly in the left (Original) and right (Modified) panels to compare.

Convert.title: JSON Converter
Convert.description: Convert JSON data to other popular formats like YAML, XML, and CSV. You can also convert these formats back to JSON.
Convert.metaTitle: JSON Converter - JSON to YAML, XML, CSV & Back | JSONKit
Convert.metaDescription: Free online JSON converter. Convert JSON to YAML, XML, CSV and back. Bidirectional conversion with instant preview. No server upload required.

Query.title: JSONPath Query
Query.description: Extract data from JSON using JSONPath expressions. Query nested objects and arrays with powerful path syntax.
Query.metaTitle: JSONPath Query Tool - Extract Data from JSON | JSONKit
Query.metaDescription: Free online JSONPath query tool. Extract data from JSON using powerful JSONPath expressions. Query nested objects and arrays with instant results.

Escape.title: JSON Escape & Unescape
Escape.description: Escape JSON strings for embedding in other JSON or code, or unescape previously escaped JSON strings back to their original format.
Escape.metaDescription: Free online JSON escape and unescape tool. Escape JSON strings for embedding in code or unescape them back to original format. Fast, browser-based processing.

Repair.title: JSON Repair
Repair.description: Automatically fix malformed JSON. Repairs common issues like trailing commas, missing quotes, single quotes, and comments.
Repair.metaTitle: JSON Repair Tool - Fix Malformed JSON | JSONKit
Repair.metaDescription: Free online JSON repair tool. Automatically fix malformed JSON including trailing commas, missing quotes, single quotes, comments, and unquoted keys.

supports.trailingCommas: Trailing commas in arrays and objects
supports.singleQuotes: Single quotes instead of double quotes

Schema.title: JSON Schema Validator
Schema.description: Validate your JSON data against a JSON Schema. Ensure your data conforms to a defined structure with detailed error reporting.
Schema.metaDescription: Free online JSON Schema validator. Validate JSON data against JSON Schema definitions with detailed error reporting. Supports draft-07 and later.
Schema.enterDataAndSchema: Enter JSON data and schema, then click Validate

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.metaDescription: JSONKit privacy policy. Learn how we handle your data - all JSON processing happens in your browser with no server transmission.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: JSONKit does not collect, store, or transmit any of your JSON data. All JSON processing happens entirely in your browser. Your data never leaves your device.

localStorage.title: Local Storage
localStorage.content: We use browser local storage to save your preferences (such as theme settings) and to remember your last input for convenience. This data is stored only on your device and is never sent to our servers.

cookies.title: Cookies and Third-Party Services
cookies.content: We use the following third-party services that may set cookies:
cookies.googleAdsense: Google AdSense: Used to display advertisements. Google may use cookies to personalize ads based on your browsing history.
cookies.googleAnalytics: Google Analytics: Used to understand how visitors use our site. This helps us improve the user experience.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Links
thirdParty.content: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these external sites. We encourage you to read the privacy policies of any linked websites you visit.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through our GitHub repository.
